article:
To become a good reader, you need to know how to select and use a reading style. There are   _   important reading styles you should learn to use. Each has its own   _  .
Study Reading is the reading style used by readers when their purpose is to read   _   materials at a high level of comprehension. When using the Study Reading style, you should read at a rate that is   _   than your normal reading rate.   _  , as you read you must challenge yourself to   _                the material. Study Reading will often   _   you to read the material more than once to33 _  a high level of comprehension. 
Skimming is the reading style used by readers when their purpose is to   _  obtain a general idea about the reading material. The Skimming style is most   _   when you have to read a large amount of material in a short amount of time. Because you are only   looking for   the main idea in each paragraph you read, you should ignore the   _   and a lower level of comprehension is to be   _  , which is not when using the Study Reading style. 
Scanning is the reading style used by readers when their purpose is to   _   a specific piece of information within a reading material. The piece of information to be located may be   _   in a list of names, words, number, short statements, and sometimes   _   in a paragraph.  _   you know exactly what you are looking for, move your    _   quickly over the reading material   _   you locate the specific piece of information you want to know. 
Before you begin your next reading assignment,   _   what the purpose of your reading is. Then use the reading style that is appropriate for your reading purpose.
